ja472:5.3: mahante → mahatte (sya1ed, sya2ed, mr) | ṭhapetuṁ → ṭhāpetuṁ (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1)
ja472:8.1: Sabbova → sabbo ca (bj, pts-vp-pli1) | ekato → ekanto (bj, pts-vp-pli1)
ja472:9.2: gambhīre ca suduttare → gambhīre ca duruttare (sya1ed, sya2ed); gambhīre suduruttare (pts-vp-pli1, mr)
ja472:12.4: Evaṁ → sukhaṁ (pts-vp-pli1, mr) | attanaṁ → attanā (sya1ed, sya2ed); attani (pts-vp-pli1, mr) evaṁ ahampi puna sotthibhāvappattaṁ gilitabaḷisaṁ purisamiva attānaṁ passāmīti (aṭṭha. saṁvaṇṇanā)
ja472:15.5: Rājaputto ahaṁ āsiṁ → ahaṁ tadā rājaputto (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1)
